Name: Legacy - Witch Island
About the game: In this mystical hidden object adventure an ordinary hot air balloon ride turns extraordinary when you accidentally wind up on a mysterious island. When it is revealed that this mystical land is ruled by an evil witch, you begin to realize that your arrival is not a coincidence, and the loyal people of the island are depending on you to defeat the evil witch. Can you destroy the witchâ€™s curse and reveal the secrets of an ancient prophecy? - Breathtaking sceneries and landscapes - Thrilling story line - Logic-based mini-games - Bonus Match-10 play - Unconventional use of HOG scenes
